App Name: Hot Pepper Beauty
App Package Name: jp.hotpepper.android.beauty.hair

Brief: Hot Pepper Beauty is Japan's comprehensive beauty and wellness appointment service. It enables users to effortlessly search, discover, and reserve their next salon experience from a vast array of options including hair salons, nail salons, beauty salons, and relaxation massages. With its expansive database, versatile search options, and numerous user reviews, this app positions itself as an essential tool for anyone looking to refine their aesthetic appeal or indulge in some self-care.
